inclusion.criterion: referred for diagnosis because of a reported symptom
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to lie prone on a couch for 10 minutes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to remain reasonably still for 2 minutes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: extremely small or extremely large breasts
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: presence of metal or blood lesion (haematoma)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) and is currently under treatment. She smokes 10 cigarettes per day and drinks alcohol occasionally.
